title: Wes Streeting – 2021 Comments on Postponed Operations
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Wes Streeting, the Shadow Health and Social Care Secretary, on 7 December 2021.
content:
It is not good enough for thousands of people in need of operations to have them cancelled, forcing them to wait longer, often in pain and discomfort.
